title: .net patcher kernel has stopped working league of legends but i have no projects folder
body: so whenever my friend launches league he gets the .net patcher kernel has stopped working league of legends error. we tried to follow the fix directions but he has no Projects folder i the rads folder, infact his rads folder is almost empty. please help.

replies.body: This error can be due to a permissions problem that's preventing the patcher from loading and scanning files.  Going over our [Permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help your friend out.  Let me know if you or he has any questions!
